goal.en: 1. Guiding the students to integrate the management knowledge they have learned and solve the business problems they may face in the future. 2. Let the students experience the organizational dynamics and leadership issues in the process of teamwork through group cooperation.
goal.ch: 1. 引導學員整合所學的管理知識，解決其日後所可能面對的經營問題。 2. 讓學員藉由分組合作的形式，體會團隊合作過程中的組織動態與領導議題。
